attributes.action: Call a General Election without delay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is Enough.  The Labour Party are going to get beaten in every Local Election held on June 4th 2009 AND the European Elections.  It is time the people of the UK had the chance to show the non-elected Prime Minister the will of the country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
